DocAttribute.Name: DependingProperty
DocAttribute.Documentation: The property on which the relationship depends.

DocAttribute.Name: Name
DocAttribute.Documentation: Name of the relationship that provides additional meaning to the nature of the dependency.

DocAttribute.Name: Expression
DocAttribute.Documentation: Expression that further describes the nature of the dependency relation.

DocWhereRule.Name: WR1
DocWhereRule.Documentation: The DependingProperty shall not point to the same instance as the DependantProperty
